name: S.P.A.S.T.I.C. - Super Peaceful Alien Space Travelling Interstellar Cruiser
name_original: S.P.A.S.T.I.C. - Super Peaceful Alien Space Travelling Interstellar Cruiser
description:
S.P.A.S.T.I.C. - Super Peaceful Alien Space Travelling Interstellar Cruiser

You were sailing uneventfully through space when suddenly you hear a noise.

You are being boarded by a swarm of mischievous coffee-loving aliens that seem to enjoy messing with your ship's terminals.

HOW TO PLAY

Maintain your terminals by going up close to the terminal screen.

Otherwise, the aliens will mess with them, sending everything in chaos and out of control

CONTROLS

MOVE - Arrow keys / WASD / controller joystick

CREDITS uidomaa - Art and code
